traits.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or spear.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1 damage) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
